scripts.deploy-cdk: cd $npm_package_cdk_dir && yarn cdk deploy $npm_package_stage-$npm_package_cdk_app --outputs-file cdk.outputs.json --require-approval never
scripts.deploy-cdk-stage: yarn build && cd $npm_package_cdk_dir && yarn cdk deploy -a 'cdk.out/' $npm_package_stage-$npm_package_cdk_app --require-approval never
scripts.diff: yarn build && cd $npm_package_cdk_dir && yarn cdk diff $npm_package_stage-$npm_package_cdk_app
scripts.destroy: yarn build && cd $npm_package_cdk_dir && yarn cdk destroy $npm_package_stage-$npm_package_cdk_app
